activities.name: Copy data - load file from ExtractionDate

dependsOn.activity: Copy data - load file from ExtractionDate

folder.name: 2. pl - load Aria CSV to Staging DB

properties.description:
Copy huge amount of data in bulk from database using external control table to store source table list with partitions for each table.

When you want to migrate data from your Azure Synapse Analytics like Oracle server, Netezza server, Teradata server or SQL Server to Azure, you have to load huge amount of data from multiple tables in data sources. In most cases, data has to be further partitioned in each table so that you can load rows with multiple threads in parallel from single table.

activities.name: Salesforce - Copy USER
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object

In most cases, data has to be further partitioned in each table so that you can load rows with multiple threads in parallel from single table.

activities.name: GetObjectList
activities.description: Lookup activity to retrieve the list of partitions stored in the external control table.

activities.name: For - loop files
activities.description: ForEach activity to get the partition list from Lookup activity and then iterate each of them to Copy activity.

source.query: select Id, LegacyId__c,PersonContactId from Account where LegacyId__c != null

source.query: select  DurableId, DeveloperName, MasterLabel, Label, IsCustomizable, IsCustomSetting, IsDeprecatedAndHidden, IsQueryable, IsIdEnabled from EntityDefinition

query.value:
SELECT Id, DurableId, QualifiedApiName, EntityDefinitionId, NamespacePrefix, DeveloperName, MasterLabel, Label, Length, DataType, ServiceDataTypeId, 
ValueTypeId, ExtraTypeInfo, IsCalculated, 
IsHighScaleNumber, IsHtmlFormatted, IsNameField, IsNillable, IsWorkflowFilterable, IsCompactLayoutable, Precision, Scale, IsFieldHistoryTracked,
 IsIndexed, IsApiFilterable, IsApiSortable,
 IsListFilterable, IsListSortable, IsApiGroupable, IsListVisible, ControllingFieldDefinitionId, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, PublisherId,
 RunningUserFieldAccessId, RelationshipName, ReferenceTargetField, Description
   FROM FieldDefinition WHERE EntityDefinitionId = '@{item().DurableId}'

SELECT Id, DurableId, QualifiedApiName, EntityDefinitionId, NamespacePrefix, DeveloperName, MasterLabel, Label, Length, DataType, ServiceDataTypeId, 
ValueTypeId, ExtraTypeInfo, IsCalculated, 
IsHighScaleNumber, IsHtmlFormatted, IsNameField, IsNillable, IsWorkflowFilterable, IsCompactLayoutable, Precision, Scale, IsFieldHistoryTracked,
 IsIndexed, IsApiFilterable, IsApiSortable,
 IsListFilterable, IsListSortable, IsApiGroupable, IsListVisible, ControllingFieldDefinitionId, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, PublisherId,
 RunningUserFieldAccessId, RelationshipName, ReferenceTargetField, Description
   FROM FieldDefinition WHERE EntityDefinitionId = '@{item().DurableId}'

activities.name: Salesforce - Load ACCOUNT_PERSON
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
      [LastName]
      ,coalesce([FirstName],'_') as FirstName
      ,[Salutation]
      ,[Type]
      ,CASE
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhHAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0E0'
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhGAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0LB'
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhIAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0LC'
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '01220000000AFrcAAG' THEN '0127R000000c0E5'
	   END as RecordTypeId

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
(select m.Id from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = c.AccountId and m.objectname='Account') as AccountId,
/*IsPersonAccount,*/
c.LastName,
c.FirstName,
c.Salutation,
'' as RecordTypeId,
c.OtherStreet,
c.OtherCity,
c.OtherState,
c.OtherPostalCode,
c.OtherCountry,
c.OtherLatitude,
c.OtherLongitude,
c.OtherGeocodeAccuracy,
c.MailingStreet,
c.MailingCity,
c.MailingState,
c.MailingPostalCode,
c.MailingCountry,
cast(c.MailingLatitude as varchar) as MailingLatitude,
cast(c.MailingLongitude as varchar) as MailingLongitude,
c.MailingGeocodeAccuracy,
c.Phone,
c.Fax,
c.MobilePhone,
c.HomePhone,
c.OtherPhone,
c.AssistantPhone,
c.ReportsToId,
c.Email,
c.Title,
c.Department,
c.AssistantName,
c.LeadSource,
c.Birthdate,
c.[Description],
/*Id, --tutaj zmiana */
c.HasOptedOutOfEmail,
c.HasOptedOutOfFax,
c.DoNotCall,
c.CreatedDate,
/*--CreatedById,systemowa */
c.LastModifiedDate,
/*--LastModifiedById,systemowa
--SystemModstamp,systemowa
--LastActivityDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastCURequestDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastCUUpdateDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastViewedDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastReferencedDate, --tutaj zmiana*/
c.EmailBouncedReason,
c.EmailBouncedDate,
/*--IsEmailBounced, --tutaj zmiana
--PhotoUrl,*/
c.Jigsaw,
/*--JigsawContactId, --tutaj zmiana*/
c.IndividualId,
/*--IsPriorityRecord, nie znaleziono takiego pola*/
c.Breve_fra_Falck__c,
c.Gode_tilbud__c,
/*--Information_Mangler__c, formuka */
c.Interesser__c,
c.MDB_ID__c,
c.Nyhedsbrev__c,
c.Email_Updated__c,
c.Email_Updated_By__c,
/*--Kunde_nr__c, formuka 
--Adresse__c, formuka */
c.Permissions_channels__c,
c.Kundenr_Dup__c,
c.BtB_Decision_Maker_Within_Productfamily__c,
c.Inactive__c,
c.Is_Dummy_Campaign_Contact__c,
c.Is_Primary__c,
c.Migration_Data_Key__c,
c.Role__c,
c.bypass_validations__c,
c.Kundenr_Dup_contact_del__c,
c.Gender__c,
/*--Is_customer__c, */
c.Has_Received_Welcome_Gift__c,
c.mitfalckdk_last_login__c, 
/*--ASF3__Account_Aria_Id__c, nie ma w nowym systemie */
c.smagicinteract__SMSOptOut__c,
/* --Contact_No__c, brak uprawnie */
c.Permissions_channels_BtB__c,
/*--ASF3__Aria_Company_Name__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_Home_Phone_Extension__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_International_Cell_Phone__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_International_Phone__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_Middle_Initial__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_Work_Phone_Extension__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Country_Code__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Do_Not_Use_Email__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Languages__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Level__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Unique_Key__c, nie ma w nowym systemie */
c.Account_No_Dup__c,
/*--Contact_Match_Criteria__c, formuka */
c.MailingAddressAwsId__c,
c.MailingAddressKvhx__c,
/*--Mailing_Address_Letter__c, formuka
--Name_and_Address_Letter__c, formuka */
c.Person_Name__c,
/*--Print_Order_Name__c, formuka
--Reminders__c, formuka */
c.Supplementary_Name__c,
c.Sync_From_Account__c,
/*--Address_Changed_Date__c, formuka*/
c.PBS_mobile_sign_up_consent__c,
c.Id as LegacyId__c
from [SF_Archive].[Contact] c where c.IsPersonAccount = 'False' and c.AccountId in (select AccountId from audit.mig_account_list)

activities.name: Salesforce - Load LEAD
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
l.LastName,
l.FirstName,
l.Salutation,
l.Title,
l.Company,
l.Street,
l.City,
l.State,
l.PostalCode,
l.Country,
l.Latitude,
l.Longitude,
l.GeocodeAccuracy,
l.Phone,
l.MobilePhone,
l.Fax,
l.Email,
l.Website,
l.Description,
l.LeadSource,
l.Status,
l.Industry,
l.Rating,
l.AnnualRevenue,
l.NumberOfEmployees,
l.HasOptedOutOfEmail,
l.IsConverted,
l.ConvertedDate, 
case 
	when l.IsConverted =1 
	then (select m.Id from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = l.ConvertedAccountId and m.objectname='Account') 
end ConvertedAccountId,
case 
	when l.IsConverted =1 
	then (select m.PersonContactId from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = l.ConvertedAccountId and m.objectname='Account') 
end ConvertedContactId,
l.IsUnreadByOwner,
DATETRUNC(day, CONVERT(DATETIME, l.CreatedDate)) as CreatedDate,
l.LastModifiedDate,
l.DoNotCall,
l.HasOptedOutOfFax,
l.smagicinteract__SMSOptOut__c,
l.Unica_AddressLine1__c,
l.Unica_AddressLine2__c,
l.Unica_Base_ID__c,
l.Unica_City__c,
l.Unica_MDB_ID__c,
l.Unica_ZipCode__c,
l.Id as LegacyId__c
from SF_archive.Lead l
where l.IsDeleted = 0 
and (
	exists (select 1 from [Audit].[mig_account_list] a where l.ConvertedAccountId = a.AccountId)
	or 
	l.ConvertedAccountId is null
)

    or o.AccountId is null
) and o.IsDeleted = 0

source.query: select Id, LegacyId__c,PersonContactId from Account where LegacyId__c != null
select Id, LegacyId__c from Contact where LegacyId__c != null

properties.description:
Copy huge amount of data in bulk from database using external control table to store source table list with partitions for each table.

When you want to migrate data from your Azure Synapse Analytics like Oracle server, Netezza server, Teradata server or SQL Server to Azure, you have to load huge amount of data from multiple tables in data sources. In most cases, data has to be further partitioned in each table so that you can load rows with multiple threads in parallel from single table.

activities.name: GetObjectList
activities.description: Lookup activity to retrieve the list of partitions stored in the external control table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [objectname]
  FROM [Audit].[mig_objects_list]
  WHERE category='Salesforce settings' 
  AND enabled=1 and load=1

activities.name: ForEachObject
activities.description: ForEach activity to get the partition list from Lookup activity and then iterate each of them to Copy activity.

activities.name: Salesforce - CopyOneObject
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object

scripts.text:
DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(max)=''
SELECT @sql += 'DROP TABLE ' + '[' + TABLE_SCHEMA + '].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Aria_Archive_1' 
Exec Sp_executesql @sql

folder.name: 2. pl - load Aria CSV to Staging DB

properties.description:
Copy huge amount of data in bulk from database using external control table to store source table list with partitions for each table.

When you want to migrate data from your Azure Synapse Analytics like Oracle server, Netezza server, Teradata server or SQL Server to Azure, you have to load huge amount of data from multiple tables in data sources. In most cases, data has to be further partitioned in each table so that you can load rows with multiple threads in parallel from single table.

activities.name: GetObjectList
activities.description: Lookup activity to retrieve the list of partitions stored in the external control table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [objectname]
  FROM [Audit].[mig_objects_list]
  WHERE enabled=1 and extract=1 and objectname!='User'

activities.name: ForEachObject
activities.description: Extract and load to STG DB

activities.name: Salesforce - CopyOneObject
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object

properties.description: to load to SF based on sql stored in mig_objects_list table

activities.name: GetObjectList
activities.description: Lookup activity to retrieve the list of partitions stored in the external control table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [objectname],[label]
FROM [Audit].[mig_objects_list]
WHERE sql is not null and enabled=1 and load =1 and objectname in ('Account') and label in ('Account_Person')
ORDER BY order_position  asc

activities.name: ForEachObject
activities.description: ForEach activity to get the partition list from Lookup activity and then iterate each of them to Copy activity.

activities.name: Salesforce - CopyOneObject
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object
